titleStmt.title: Of the antient lavves of great Britaine. George Saltern
titleStmt.author: Salteren, George.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by Edward Allde] for Iohn Iaggard, and are to bee solde at his shop in Fleetestreete, at the signe of the hand and Starre,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: De antiquis Britanniæ legibus.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: his shop in Fleetestreete, at the signe of the hand
